name: Kissu! Kissu! Sugoi Dating Adventure
description:
Hello! Im Qeeki!
I study in HSE university in Russia to become a gamedesigner!
This is my first game.
Its badly working right now but i'm planning on updating it to make it less buggy.
Basically this game is about dating anime girls with awful artstyle and dialogues.
It was made as a joke.
But i hope i can turn it into a full game with different girls and mechanics.
